description: Part of "CREATIVE CODING EXPLORATIONS" a personal project, Exploring and experimenting with creative coding on a daily basis. Inspired by pop culture, often using music and movie references as the premise of my animations. Listen to what it makes me feel and visually communicate that through the design, form and motion. While creative coding is a powerful tool, we have not seen its full potential. I believe this will rapidly change in the upcoming years as more creatives discover it's capabilities.
